content.html:
I didn’t know at some point they had a Summer’s version planned. That would’ve been interesting! As I aged my sympathy towards Summer has grown.

This also reminded me of The Disappearance of Eleanor Rigby, a movie with three versions: “Him”, “Her” and “Them” - but watching one was enough, it’s heartbreaking film.
content.text:
